admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: (a) improvement
            and extension of two national irrigation systems to serve
            12,000 ha; (b) improvement and extension of 3,000 ha of
            communal irrigation systems; (c) hydro-meteorological
            studies; (d) a watershed protection program; (e)
            construction and improvement of about 150 km of national
            highways and 280 km of provincial roads; (f) improvement to
            Calapan Port; (g) an agricultural program to produce
            certified rice seed and control rats; (h) a schistosomiasis
            control program; and (i) assistance to minority Mangyan tribes.
